summary: This document contains a forwarded email chain discussing a scheduled call to confirm a wire transfer related to Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby from Deutsche Bank is coordinating the call with Richard Kahn and Arthur Tendler, indicating a business relationship involving financial transactions.
